translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The Chapter on the Faculties

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽7.11. Sekkhattika🔽Nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sekkhattika  na sekkham dhammam paṭicca pe na asekkham dhammam paṭicca pe na nevasekkha na asekkham dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad on the Developed🔽With a developed factor as condition … With an undeveloped factor as condition … With a neither-developed-nor-undeveloped factor as condition … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: In the cause, twenty-nine; in the object, twenty-four; … in the prenascence, seventeen; … in the non-disappearance, twenty-nine.
